mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `hotlist`(company,pn,mfg,pkge,qty,price,dtcd,qlty,dtime,buylink,hdate,uid) VALUES(#{company},#{pn},#{mfg},#{pkge},#{qty},#{price},#{dtcd},(select id from qltytype where name like concat('%',#{qltyName},'%') ),#{dtime},#{buylink},now(),#{uid})
mapper.select:
select count(1) from hotlist
AND uid = #{condition.uid}
AND company like concat('%', #{condition.hotstk.company} ,'%')
AND pn like concat('%', #{condition.hotstk.pn} ,'%')

select h.*,q.name qltyName from hotlist h,qltytype q where h.qlty=q.id
and pn like concat('%',#{pn},'%')
and pntype=#{ptype}
limit 20
